title: Pakistan Nursing and Midwifery Council Ordinance, 2025
title_en: Pakistan Nursing and Midwifery Council Ordinance, 2025
description: Official consolidated text of Pakistan Nursing and Midwifery Council Ordinance, 2025 (IX of 2025) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 0. Full text
provisions.content:
Sulaiman   PC # 08   Job No. 1985 (25)Ex-Gaz-I Law and Justice
PART I]     THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., SEPT. 26, 2025                  727
ISLAMABAD, FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 26, 2025
Acts, Ordinances, President’s Orders and Regulations
Islamabad, the 26th September, 2025
F. No. 2(1)/2025-Pub.—The following Ordinance promulaged on
25th September, 2025 by the President is hereby published for general
information:—
ORDINANCE NO. IX OF 2025
AN
to amend and consolidate the laws relating to registration and training of
nurses, nurse practitioners, midwives, midwifery associate and nurse auxiliaries
WHEREAS it is expedient to amend and consolidate the laws relating to
registration, licensing and training of nurses, nurse practitioners, midwives,
midwifery associate, nurse auxiliaries and to provide for matters connected
herewith and ancillary thereto.
(727)
Price: Rs. 40.00
[1985(2025)Ex.Gaz.]
